title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.12 - Tripping hazard
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.12 - Tripping hazard

State Regulations

The owner of a machine exposed for normal operation shall
not suffer or permit any floor or other areas open to occupation or traversal
by employes or other persons to be obstructed by pipes, hose, cables, wiring or
projections, nor to have protruding nails, splinters, holes, depressions or
loose or broken surfaces likely to cause tripping. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
